library(plyr)

```{r}

read_from <- function(path) {
  data = read.csv(path)
  yr_mean = ddply(data, .(year), summarize,  left=mean(left), scotland=mean(scotland), temperature=mean(temperature))
  yr_mean = yr_mean[yr_mean$year > 2003, ]
  yr_mean
}

read_data <- function(path) {
  x1 = read_from(sprintf("./log_process/result%s_1.csv", path))
  x1$epoch = rep(1)
  x2 = read_from(sprintf("./log_process/result%s_2.csv", path))
  x2$epoch = rep(2)
  x3 = read_from(sprintf("./log_process/result%s_3.csv", path))
  x3$epoch = rep(3)
  
  x = rbind(x1, x2, x3)
  x = ddply(x, .(year), summarize,  left=mean(left), scotland=mean(scotland), temperature=mean(temperature))
  x
}

roll_mean_data <- function(data) {
  x = rollmean(data, k=5)
}

x1 = read_data("")
x2 = read_data("_0.05")
x3 = read_data("_0.02")
x1_ = data.frame(roll_mean_data(x1))
x1_$case = rep("0.01 avg")
x2_ = data.frame(roll_mean_data(x2))
x2_$case = rep("0.005 avg")
x3_ = data.frame(roll_mean_data(x3))
x3_$case = rep("0.02 avg")
x1$Type = "orig"
x2$Type = "orig"
x3$Type = "orig"
x1_$Type = "avg"
x2_$Type = "avg"
x3_$Type = "avg"
x1$Size = 1
x2$Size = 1
x3$Size = 1
x1_$Size = 2
x2_$Size = 2
x3_$Size = 2
x1$Val = "0.01"
x2$Val = "0.005"
x3$Val = "0.02"
x1_$Val = "0.01"
x2_$Val = "0.005"
x3_$Val = "0.02"

x1$case = rep("0.01")
x2$case = rep("0.005")
x3$case = rep("0.02")
xx = rbind(x1, x2, x3, x1_, x2_, x3_)
xx$case = factor(xx$case)
xx
```

```{r}
ggplot(xx, aes(year, left, group = case)) + 
  geom_line(aes(linetype = Type, color = Val, size = Size)) +
  labs(y = "Count", x = "Year", color = "sigma\n") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  theme(plot.margin = unit(c(0,0,0,0), "cm")) +
  scale_size(range=c(0.3, 1), guide=FALSE) +
  theme_minimal()
ggsave('figure/o_fish_total.pdf', width=6, height=3)
```

data$Type = rep("")
data[data$year>2019,]$Type = rep("Prediction")
data[data$year<=2019,]$Type = rep("History")
x = data[data$year_month=="2019-10",]
x$Type=rep("Prediction")
ndata = rbind(data, x)
xx = seq(100, 300, by=36)
ggplot(ndata[100:300,], aes(factor(id), temperature, group=1, colour=Type)) + 
  geom_line(linetype = "solid") +
  labs(y = "Temperature", x = "Year") +
  scale_x_discrete(breaks = xx, labels=ndata$year[xx]) +
  theme(plot.margin = unit(c(0,0,0,0), "cm")) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  
  theme_minimal()

ggsave('figure/fish_temp_month.pdf', width=6, height=4)
